text:
Today I interacted with 100â€™s of Americans in the streets of New York as I interviewed them for the @gatewaypundit â€¦
The amount of kindness in the air was overwhelming and you could feel the palpable energyâ€¦ even those that are not supporters of President Trump engaged in an amazing friendly way.
To all the Gen Z peeps out there that stopped to chat with me, I love you guys for wanting to have positive dialogue.
God Bless the USA!
